data.text: Munna Nateofilo,
mpaka nihuku naakushiye awe wiirimu. Nansho hinaya ukushiya wiirimu ahaalhehera wo ikuru yo Iphumu ya Nlhuku, akarumiya aathanlhe awe.
Wo mahuku makhumi macheshe toka vaahihimmwe awe ahaakhumelhelha wo iphiro chinchi uhimiechesha wiira hohihimmwa. Aheechooniha wa akarumiya awe, ni woopana mwaha unaacha Imwene ya Nlhuku.
Ikatema yaakumanne awe vamoka ahaalhehera wiira, “Nhithame va Yerusalemu, nansho mummweherereke Iphumu ya Nlhuku, mpochere izawadi ilhehiye ni Athithi uvahani.
Nayohana yaabatinze attu wo maashi, nansho yaviraka mahuku vakani, mwaattiva nnoowa mwaabatiiziya wo Iphumu ya Nlhuku.”
Paahi akarumiya ikatema vaakumanne aya ni Yesu, yahonkoha, “Thithi, chani ilha ikatema ilha phi naahokolhoshera inyu umwene attu o Uisraeli?”
Yesu nkeerelha, “Mwaatti kuhii ntheko inyu uchuwelha ikatema yo ukhumelhelha waya, yeyo irii mu ikuru ya Athumwanaka vekha aya.
Nansho nnoowa mwaapochera machiri o Iphumu ya Nlhuku vanohalha aya uukhuruwelhani. Ni inyu nnoowa mwaakihimiechesha Uyerusalemu ni ilhapo yonkhaye yo Uyudea ni Usamariya ni kila vakittu velhaponi.”
Amalhiheke wulhumacha yayo, ahokushiya wiirimu attu onkhaye amwoonaka, nihute nkanankhuneelha ahimwoonaka tho.
Nansho vaathepa aya uweha wiirimu, Yesu vaarwaa awe, wo uhipicha attu elhi yaawanre ikuwo cho utakatifu twetwetwe yaheemelha ni waatameria.
Nkayeera, “Attu o Ugalilaya! Chani woonaka nheemelha mmwehaka wiirimu? Ulha Yesu kushiye ukhuma uwaninyu urwaa wiirimu ulha, noowa tho thoko chimoonilhe inyu arwaaka wiirimu chiyo.”
Yamalhekeru akarumiya yahohokolhia Uyerusalemu ukhuma waari mwaako uneehaniya Mwaako wo Mizeituni waari imaili imoka, waatameriaka nkwaha wo Nihuku no Wiittuwa.

Vaaphilhe aya vawani nkayaakelha uchuumbani inupa yo nchulhu ugoroofani mwaakhalha aya. Yayo yaari Napeturo ni Nayohana vamoka ni Nayakhobo ni Naandorea ni Nafilipo ni Natomaso tho ni Nabatolomayo ni Namatayo ni nkina aari Yakhobo mwaamwanaa Naalufayo ni Nasimoni Nnenchi aakhwelha ilhapo yo Ukaanani ni Nayuda mwaana a ashinna Yakhobo.
Nkawakumaaniya akarumiya vamoka ni manyopani akina ni Amariamu anumwanawe Yesu ni ashihima awe unlhapelha Nlhuku wo nrima mmoka.
Nihuku nimoka Napeturo yaheemelha ni wulhumacha munlhokoni mwa attu aarumelhenlhe Athithi, yaaphiyelha attu imia imoka ni makhumi melhi,

nkayeera, “Ashilhoko aka munrumelhenlhe Yesu, wo woorihiya ni machiri o Iphumu ya Nlhuku, Adaudi aholhepa nlhove no waacha Nayuda nhina Malhove Matakatifu, ni nno nihokhumelhelha. Nayuda yaari akhunanihu, nansho phi yayo yaaholhenlhe attu yammanre Yesu.
Nayuda yaari amoka munkutironi mwihu, ukhalhawaya ahothanlhiya ni Yesu ulhutaana ni hii mu nthekoni wihu.”
Nayuda yahothuma imata wo nchurukhu waalhiviye aya wo uhilhoka waya. Nkayaawulhuwa wowo umatani uwo, nkayaaphwia nthunkwa ni marupo aya nkayaakhuma vathe.
Attu o Uyerusalemu veewilhe aya yoyo mwaha uyo, nkayeehana yeyo imata iyo wo nulhumo naya, Hakelidama, maana aya, “Imata yo Iphome.”
“Ukhalhawaya iholhepiya nhina ikitabu yo Izaburi,
“Paahi etu athanlhiyeke ntu mmoka o unikaviha ntheko wo uhimiechesha uhihimmwa wa Athithi Yesu.
Yoyo akhalheke ntu mmoka anttukana ihu toka nihuku Athithi Yesu vaabatiiziye aya ni Nayohana mpaka nihuku naakushiye aya wiirimu nne. Yoyo nookhalha o uhimiechesha uhihimmwa wa Yesu.”
Nkayaaromolhiya machina a attu elhi, o upacha yaari Nayusufu yeehaniya Nabarsaba tho yeehaniya Yusto. O nayelhi yaari Namatiya.
Yamalhiheke nkayanlhapelha Nlhuku, “Thithi, inyuva phi nochuwelha mirima cha attu onkhaye chiri aya! Paahi etu, nnooniheke mpani wa alha attu elhi alha munthanlhe phuuyi,
wiira akhalhe karumiya ntheko uhiilhe aya Nayuda, nkayaarwaa vakittu vaaphwanenlhe aya.”
Nkayoopa ikhura, nkaathanlhiya Namatiya yonchereriye munlhokoni mwa akarumiya khumi ni mmoka alhe.
